name: Restaurant Ciao
description:
Who doesn't love it - the Italian life? 


The cozy evenings in a Mediterranean atmosphere, excellent food in good company, a glass of wine with friends ... this wonderful feeling of nonchalance, which makes us forget the hardships of everyday life for a while ... In "Ciao e più" you'll find this special atmosphere. An ambience that is otherwise known only from the Italy vacation..

Sit back and Treat yourself to well-deserved break, the little "holiday" in "Ciao e più", of the Dolce Vita brings you directly to Mayrhofen.
